text:
Asana is a leading
work management platform.

Amazon Q business
accelerates Asana's vision
of being the coordination layer for work.

Q speeds up the discoverability
of important information.

This is really helpful in
a couple different ways.

The first is it directly
links to reference material.
So for example,

if you're planning a new
marketing campaign in Asana,

it can link to all the different
marketing campaign briefs
in the past that are stored in G Drive.
It also gives you access

to search across all the
different tools that teams use.
So imagine being able

to pull information in
from a Zoom transcript

that then supplements
the information in Asana

and in Microsoft 365, to
give you a holistic answer
of what's the context that I need to know
to do this particular job quite well.
Last, it surfaces proactive insights.

So imagine that a customer
just raised an escalation
and that's in Salesforce,

but the team actually
doing the work is in Asana.

That information could
be proactively pushed out

of Salesforce so that the
team working in Asana can know
instantaneously

and better satisfy that
customer more quickly.

We're excited about Amazon
Q Business pulling in
more context.
It just makes planning

that much smarter across all
the different surface areas

that your teams are using
to work cross-functionally.
